name: Advent Machina
description:
Advent Machina v.003 is a 3D racing game that would be developed in unity. A game that takes place in the year 2XXX, World War 3 erupts because of the increasing tenacity of the Chinese Regime against Hong Kong. Team Advent Machina meets up with Snake and has to reach the extraction point before the Chinese shoots down the extraction helicopter.

Developed By T-REKTS Studios

- Frank Morris Pita

- Dan Ethelred Velasco

- Joseph Martin Tan

- Bennedict Soliman

- Datu Elias Diego

-Justine Zebedee Ong (Xynking)
